content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: orange_bed
inventory=[{"type": "dragon_breath", "quantity": 10, "index": 11}, {"type": "brown_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 15}, {"type": "jungle_boat", "quantity": 1, "index": 16}, {"type": "brown_terracotta", "quantity": 30, "index": 17}, {"type": "sea_pickle", "quantity": 64, "index": 18}, {"type": "grass_path", "quantity": 52, "index": 21}, {"type": "structure_void", "quantity": 31, "index": 22}, {"type": "quartz_stairs", "quantity": 63, "index": 25}, {"type": "iron_helmet", "quantity": 1, "index": 26}, {"type": "scaffolding", "quantity": 26, "index": 29}, {"type": "zombie_horse_spawn_egg", "quantity": 39, "index": 31}, {"type": "chainmail_chestplate", "quantity": 1, "index": 32}, {"type": "oak_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 35}, {"type": "book", "quantity": 20, "index": 39}, {"type": "yellow_banner", "quantity": 14, "index": 40}, {"type": "soul_soil", "quantity": 39, "index": 41}, {"type": "crimson_stem", "quantity": 1, "index": 42}, {"type": "stripped_jungle_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 43}, {"type": "cookie", "quantity": 21, "index": 44}, {"type": "orange_wool", "quantity": 3, "index": 45}]

thought: To craft an orange_bed, I need to craft jungle_planks. To do this, I need to place a stripped_jungle_log into the crafting grid. Therefore, I will move the stripped_jungle_log at slot 43 into the crafting grid at slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 35 to slot 1 with quantity 1

act: move from slot 0 to slot 12 with quantity 4
